name: Hello Kitty
description: Hello Kitty is a cheerful and happy girl with a heart of gold.

name: My Melody
description: My Melody is a sweet, honest, and good-natured girl who is close friends with Hello Kitty.

name: Keroppi
description: Keroppi is an energetic and adventurous frog who loves to explore and have fun.

name: Badtz-Maru
description: Badtz-Maru is a mischievous penguin with a rebellious attitude but a good heart.

name: Pompompurin
description: Pompompurin is a laid-back golden retriever who loves to take naps and eat pudding.
